nodes.text: During the Kymoodon Era, a clan battle took place on the planet Lexrul in the Trax sector. The battle was fought by cybernetically enhanced slave berserkers belonging to two rival Hutt kajidics. The event took place after an assault on Lexrul by Hutt-backed forces in which many of the colonists were enslaved, although some escaped and witnessed the following clan battle. The battle was mentioned centuries later by Thunys Albegron, an academician of Popular Studies, during the Conference on Popular Entertainment held on the planet Obroa-skai in 6 ABY.

The clan battle was first mentioned in the 2014 fifth entry in the Star Wars: The Essential Guide to Warfare Author's Cut series of posts by Jason Fry on the StarWars.com blog. The article featured content cut from The Essential Guide to Warfare a book released in 2012 by Fry.
